pages.text:
About Glen Eagle Golf & Country Club
Purposefully Planned. Rooted in Community.
Glen Eagle Golf & Country Club is a private, gated, deeded, membership community with 15 unique neighborhood communities that offer residences ranging from condos to villas to private homes. With 924 golf memberships and 310 social memberships available in the heart of Naples, Florida, residents can enjoy the complete country club experience just minutes from fine dining, boating and fishing, high-end shopping, world-class cultural attractions and the Gulf.
Request Tour
Explore Lifestyle Amenities
Our History
Glen Eagle Golf & Country Club was established in the early 1990s on land originally used as a private hunting and fishing retreat. What started as Embassy Woods Golf and Country Club evolved into a thoughtfully planned, private golf community just minutes from downtown Naples. The community’s 18-hole course, designed by Mark McCumber, opened in 1991 as a public course.
As the community grew, residents took an active role in its governance and development. In 1998, the community changed hands and was renamed Glen Eagle Golf & Country Club in 1998. By 2004, homeowners gained full ownership and control of the Club, selecting the first general manager.
Since then, Glen Eagle has continued to invest in its lifestyle amenities, including golf course improvements by the famed Gordon Lewis. The years have also brought many neighborhood and facilities enhancements – all while preserving the close-knit, welcoming character that defines the community today.
Golf Membership
A golf membership entitles the owner to the full use of all facilities and the golf course year-round. You cannot purchase a golf membership separate from a home or change membership to a golf membership if the home you own is deeded as a social membership. Please contact the Administrative Office
239-354-3167
for the current Master Association annual fees and golf fees.
Social Membership
A social membership entitles the owner to the full use of all facilities year round and the golf course from May through October. You cannot change membership to a golf membership if the home you own is deeded as a social membership. Please contact the Administrative Office
239-354-3167
for the current Master Association annual fees.
Our Core Values
Our core values are principles and standards that define our character, direct the decisions made by leadership, and preserve what is special about Glen Eagle Country Club and our community.
Integrity
Acting ethically in the best interests of our membership, club, and community.
Camaraderie
A community that is friendly, sociable, welcoming, and respectful of each other.
Inclusivity
Providing an environment which encourages participation and enduring friendships.
Value
Balance cost and quality in a manner that provides the best experience at an affordable price point for the membership.
Fiscal
Ensuring operating budgets and reserves are sufficient to meet the current and long run financial needs of the club.
Quality
Providing amenities, products and services that meet the expectations of the membership.
Leadership
Managing the club and community in a manner that is inspirational, accountable, collaborative, adaptable, and forward thinking.
Environment
Managing our natural resources responsibly.
Transparency
Openly and honestly communicating with all members and employees regarding policies, events, issues, and finances.
Glen Eagle Golf & Country Club is a private, gated, deeded, membership community.
Glen Eagle offers its members, transferees, and their guests a par-70, 18-hole championship golf course, fitness center, bocce courts, clubhouse with a billiard room, card rooms, meeting rooms and activities center. Residents access BlueStream Fiber internet and basic cable services as members of the Master Association.  The Restaurant consists of a dining room, a private dining room, and a full-service bar and lounge area, The Divot is a  Cafe next to the Bocce courts.
Phone
239.354.3167
Address
1403 Glen Eagle Boulevard
Naples,FL
34104
Email
[email protected]
© 2025  Glen Eagle Golf and Country Club. All Rights Reserved.
Powered by Jonas Club Software
